settings.mainheading: Get a Custom Gift Basket Quote
settings.gifttext: Looking to kick off a new marketing campaign or want to recognize special clients?  AG&B offers Gift Baskets  and  customization services for your needs.  Each basket can be designed or customized according to your specifications and can include add-ins to make your baskets more personal.  You may customize an existing Gift Basket or request a brand new creation.
settings.rightlist:
• Minimum Order of 25 units.
  • Must pre-order 3 weeks prior to your Delivery Date.
  • Proforma, Full payment required.
  • Bulk Order form required to place order.
  • Ship on your own carrier account (*optional*).
